title: Circulation of the Arizona Republic 2018
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Circulation for 2 number of Days.
The Circulation is appeared to be the highest at Day Sunday and lowest at Day Daily.
The highest Day Sunday has 248319.0 more Circulation than the lowest Day Daily.
min_summary: This bar chart has 2 columns on the x axis representing Day, and Circulation in each Day on the y axis.
The Circulation is highest at Day Sunday and lowest at Day Daily.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Circulation for 2 number of Days.
The Circulation is appeared to be the highest at Day Sunday and lowest at Day Daily.
The highest Day Sunday has 248319.0 more Circulation than the lowest Day Daily.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Day in the x axis and Circulation in the y axis.
The Circulation is appeared to be the highest at Day Sunday and lowest at Day Daily.
Day Sunday has 2.91 times more Circulation than Day Daily which is has the lowest.
The average Circulation in all 2 Days is 254442.5.
